text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigū: "Ojo [mexohed] şumoro az cize ogoh kunam, ki az in [doroiho va lazzathoi moddī] ʙehtar ʙoşad"? Kasone, ki taqvo peşa kardaand, nazdi Parvardigoraşon ʙoƣhoe dorand, ki az zeri [daraxtoni] on çūjʙorho ravon ast; çovidona dar on xohand ʙud va hamsaroni pokiza [va ʙeajʙ dorand] va [hamcunin] az xuşnudii Alloh taolo [ʙarxūrdorand]; va Alloh taolo ʙa [ahvoli] ʙandagon ʙinost
